What is Ndax Wealth â€“ OTC Desk?

Ndax Wealth is a leading Over-The-Counter (OTC) trading desk, specifically designed to meet the needs of high-net-worth individuals and institutional investors seeking to trade digital assets of $25,000 or more.

We offer exclusive access to deep liquidity pools and a diverse range of digital assets, ensuring the efficient execution of high-volume trades with minimal slippage. Our clients benefit from a tailored, white-glove service, real-time market pricing, and a seamless trading experience.

For further details or to arrange a consultation, please schedule a meeting with one of our licensed Institutional Sales Associates at ndax.io/en/wealth-crypto-otc-exchange, or reach out to us directly at otc@ndax.io.
